summary: Quinoa is a plant with edible seeds, often called a pseudocereal. It's related to spinach and amaranth and comes from South America. People have grown it for thousands of years, first for animals and later for themselves. Quinoa is super nutritious, packed with protein, fiber, vitamins, and minerals. It grows best at high altitudes. Today, it's farmed in many countries worldwide and has become very popular, especially in North America and Europe.
title: Quinoa
